name: @rallycommerce/swell
description: Rally checkout button integration for Swell

scripts.develop: node pre-build.js develop && configuration=develop rollup -c && node generate-package.js
scripts.sandbox: node pre-build.js stage && configuration=sandbox rollup -c && node generate-package.js
scripts.stage: node pre-build.js stage && configuration=stage rollup -c && node generate-package.js

author: Rally Commerce Inc.
